	O
BACKGROUND	O
INFORMATION	O


	O
Pristina	B-FAC
International	I-FAC
Airport	I-FAC
constitutes	O
a	O
state	O
owned	O
enterprise	O
under	O
Yugoslavian	B-NORP
law	O
.	O
The	O
assets	O
of	O
the	B-ORG
airport	O
include	O
the	B-ORG
runways	O
,	O
terminal	O
buildings	O
,	O
hangar	O
,	O
fuel	O
storage	O
facilities	O
and	O
equipment	O
.	O
During	O
the	B-ORG
period	O
covered	O
by	O
this	O
investigation	O
,	O
from	O
2001	B-DATE
until	O
2003	B-DATE
,	O
they	O
were	O
maintained	O
by	O
the	B-ORG
Public	I-ORG
Enterprise	I-ORG
Airport	I-FAC
Pristina	B-FAC
(	O
PEAP	O
)	O
in	O
cooperation	O
with	O
Military	O
Units	O
of	O
the	B-ORG
Kosovo	B-GPE
Force	I-ORG
(	O
KFOR	O
)	O
.	O
Pursuant	O
to	O
United	B-ORG
Nations	I-ORG
Security	I-ORG
Council	I-ORG
Resolution	O
1244	O
dated	O
10	B-DATE
June	I-DATE
1999	I-DATE
,	O
and	O
UNMIK	B-ORG
Regulation	I-ORG
No	O
1/1999	O
dated	O
25	B-DATE
July	I-DATE
1999	I-DATE
,	O
UNMIK	B-ORG
is	O
mandated	O
to	O
administer	O
the	B-ORG
territory	O
of	O
Kosovo	B-GPE
,	O
including	O
state	O
owned	O
and	O
publicly	O
owned	O
assets	O
.	O
This	O
includes	O
Pristina	B-FAC
International	I-FAC
Airport	I-FAC
.	O
"	O

"	O
A	O
bid	O
evaluation	O
report	O
dated	O
6	B-DATE
December	I-DATE
2002	I-DATE
indicates	O
that	O
8	B-CARDINAL
firms	O
were	O
issued	O
with	O
documents	O
and	O
4	B-CARDINAL
bids	O
were	O
submitted	O
.	O
The	O
bids	O
were	O
opened	O
on	O
27	B-DATE
November	I-DATE

)	O

To	O

an	O
individual	O
loan	O
,	O

“	O

(	O

3	O
)	O

“	O
Instant	O

&	O
Agreement	O
Form	O
”	O
(	O
Attachment	O
4	O
)	O
.	O
The	O

must	O
attach	O
to	O
his	O
/	O
her	O
request	O

his	O
/	O

,	O
National	B-ORG
Identification	I-ORG

or	O

of	O
his	O
/	O
her	O
letter	O
of	O
contract	O
.	O
A	O
copy	O
of	O
the	O
letter	O
of	O
contract	O
is	O
required	O
to	O
ensure	O
that	O
the	O
applicant	O
holds	O
a	O
valid	O
contract	O
,	O
which	O
covers	O
the	O
agreed	O
period	O
of	O
time	O
for	O
the	O
repayment	O
of	O
the	O
loan	O
.	O
The	O
benefit	O
of	O
a	O
longer	O
contract	O
is	O
that	O
it	O
permits	O
repayment	O
in	O
lesser	O
amounts	O
over	O
a	O
longer	O
period	O
of	O
time	O
.	O
To	O
ensure	O
guarantee	O
of	O
repayment	O
,	O
the	O
applicant	O
must	O
provide	O
up	O
to	O
six	B-CARDINAL
guarantors	O
in	O
the	O
event	O
of	O
the	O
borrower	O
’s	O
default	O
.	O

also	O
be	O
UN	B-ORG

members	O
.	O

-	O

Habitat	B-ORG

	O
Betta	I-ORG
fish	O
originated	O
from	O
Thailand	B-GPE
but	O
can	O
be	O
found	O
in	O
nearby	O
countries	O
such	O
as	O
Malaysia	B-GPE
,	O
Indonesia	B-GPE
,	O
Vietnam	B-GPE
,	O
Laos	B-GPE
,	O
and	O
Cambodia	B-GPE
.	O
Wild	O
bettas	B-GPE
live	O
in	O
shallow	O
,	O
freshwater	O
areas	O
such	O
as	O
rice	O
paddies	O
,	O
stagnant	O
ponds	O
,	O
marshes	O
,	O
and	O
slow	O
-	O
moving	O
streams	O
.	O
Being	O
used	O
to	O
Asian	B-NORP
climates	O
,	O
they	O
prefer	O
warm	O
water	O
around	O
80º	O
Fahrenheit	O
.	O
Colder	O
water	O
can	O
cause	O

to	O

,	O
stop	O
eating	O
,	O
or	O
become	O
more	O

to	O
disease	O
or	O
infection	O
.	O

consists	O
of	O
plankton	B-GPE
,	O
crustaceans	O
,	O
and	O
larvae	O
.	O


	O

are	O

low	O
in	O
oxygen	O

bettas	B-GPE
have	O

air	O
at	O
the	O
water	O
’s	O
surface	O
.	O

over	O
time	O
:	O

rely	O
on	O
their	O

is	O

to	O
the	O
gills	O
and	O
functions	O
similarly	O
to	O
a	O
human	O
lung	O
.	O

The	O
term	O
“	O
vitamins	O
”	O
was	O

when	O
Dr	O
Casimir	B-PERSON

as	O
beri	O
-	O
beri	O
(	O
Vitamin	B-ORG
B1	B-CARDINAL
deficiency	O
)	O
and	O
scurvy	O
(	O
Vitamin	B-ORG
C	O
deficiency	O
)	O
.	O
This	O
class	O
of	O
organic	O
compounds	O
seemed	O
“	O
vital	O
to	O
life	O
”	O

so	O
he	O
named	O
them	O
“	O
vitamines	O
”	O
—	O
a	O
term	O
that	O
has	O
evolved	O
into	O
what	O
we	O
now	O
know	O
as	O
vitamins	O
.	O


	O
Both	O
vitamins	O
and	O
minerals	O
are	O
micronutrients	O
which	O
are	O
needed	O
in	O
small	O
amounts	O
for	O
our	O
bodies	O
to	O
function	O
properly	O
.	O
The	O
13	B-CARDINAL
essential	O
vitamins	O
:	O
Vitamins	O
A	O
,	O
C	O
,	O
D	O
,	O
E	O
,	O
K	O
,	O
and	O
the	O
B	O
group	O
of	O
vitamins	O
(	O
B1	B-CARDINAL
,	O
B2	O
,	O
B3	O
,	O
B5	B-PERSON
,	O
B6	O
,	O
B7	B-PERSON
,	O
B9	B-GPE
,	O
B12	B-ORG
)	O
,	O
are	O
found	O
in	O
organic	O
sources	O
such	O
as	O
plants	O
and	O
animals	O
,	O
while	O
minerals	O
are	O
inorganic	O
elements	O
that	O
originate	O
from	O
the	O
earth	O
and	O
water	O
.	O
Both	O
vitamins	O
and	O
minerals	O
play	O
specific	O
roles	O
in	O
bodily	O
functions	O
,	O
and	O
their	O
corresponding	O
deficiencies	O
are	O
linked	O
to	O
a	O
range	O
of	O
health	O
issues	O
,	O
including	O
greater	O
susceptibility	O
to	O
illness	O
due	O
to	O
a	O
weak	O
immune	O
system	O
.	O

“	O
One	B-CARDINAL
of	I-ORG
the	B-ORG

of	I-ORG
our	O
study	O
is	O
the	B-ORG

of	I-ORG
